name: Intern Quest 1: Road to Red Larch
name_original: Intern Quest 1: Road to Red Larch
description:
Do you have what it takes to work for the most renowned adventuring company in the multiverse? In this solo gamebook turned Twine game, you are a new intern for Acquisitions Incorporated's most formidable team, the "C" Team - but the journey to join them will be more difficult than anything you have ever experienced. Your choices (and the luck of the dice) will determine whether you take your rightful place alongside Faerun's greatest team of incorporated adventuring franchisees or are sent back to Waterdeep in shame!

Based on the adventures of Acquisitions Incorporated: The "C" Team, acq-inc.com
